entry.title: Bible story "Going Fishing" | Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 1 | Gracelink

media:group.media:title: Bible story "Going Fishing" | Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 1 | Gracelink
media:group.media:description:
Friends, Share with others, and Subscribe to our channel - https://www.youtube.com/c/HopeKidsOfficial I follow Jesus and share Him with others. "Come, follow me, Jesus said, and I will make you fishers of men" (Matthew 4:19, NIV).
All of Gracelink Primary Lessons are here:

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 2 "Living Water?"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 2 "Living Water?"
media:group.media:description: Jesus is everyone's Friend. " 'Whoever drinks the water I give him will never thirst' " (John 4:14, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 3 "Help for the Hungry"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 3 "Help for the Hungry"
media:group.media:description: serve Jesus when I help to meet others' needs. " 'Give them something to eat' "(Matthew 14:16, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 4 "Do You Love Me?"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 4 "Do You Love Me?"
media:group.media:description: We serve God when we take care of others. “Again Jesus said,. . . ‘Do you truly love me? . . . Take care of my sheep’ (John 21:16, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 5 "Twice Blessed"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 5 "Twice Blessed"
media:group.media:description: God gives me blessings, more than I can ask or imagine. “[He] is able to do immeasurably more than all we ask or imagine” (Ephesians 3:20, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 6 "Namaan and the Dirty River"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 6 "Namaan and the Dirty River"
media:group.media:description: God’s grace is for everyone. “From the fullness of his grace we have all received one blessing after another” (John 1:16, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 7 "Heavy Enough to Float"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 7 "Heavy Enough to Float"
media:group.media:description: God cares about all my problems.“ ‘Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find’ ” (Matthew 7:7, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 8 "More Than Meets the Eye"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 8 "More Than Meets the Eye"
media:group.media:description: God helps us when we are in trouble. “The angel of the Lord encamps around those who fear him, and he delivers them” (Psalm 34:7, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 9 "Favourite Son"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 9 "Favourite Son"
media:group.media:description: God helps me love my Christian family.“ ‘Love each other as I have loved you’ ” (John 15:12, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 10 "Don't Let Go!"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 10 "Don't Let Go!"
media:group.media:description: When I obey God, I make the right choices in my community. “Hold on to what you have, so that no one will take your crown”(Revelation 3:11, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 11 "Free at Last"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 11 "Free at Last"
media:group.media:description: God helps me to be faithful no matter what happens. “ ‘Well done, good and faithful servant! You have been faithful with a few things; I will put you in charge of many things’ ” (Matthew 25:23, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 12 "Finally Forgiven"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 12 "Finally Forgiven"
media:group.media:description: God helps me to forgive others. “‘Forgive, and you will be forgiven’”(Luke 6:37, NIV).

entry.title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 13 "Together Again"

media:group.media:title: Primary Year C Quarter 3 Episode 13 "Together Again"
media:group.media:description: God helps me to forgive others. “ ‘Forgive, and you will be forgiven’ ”(Luke 6:37, NIV).
